I

IDataDecoder - Interface in net.krotscheck.dfr
This interface describes a data decoder, which attempts to convert a table-based file into an iterable key/value map.
IDataEncoder - Interface in net.krotscheck.dfr
This interface describes a data encoder, which accepts rows of data and writes them to a specific file format.
iterator() - Method in class net.krotscheck.dfr.FileStreamDecoder
Returns the iterator from the underlying data stream.
